heading: Configure your Router
description: Freifunk is an independent, free and open community network built by volunteers.
freifunk: We agree to the pico peering agreement, please read more about the vision and our memorandum of understanding

offlineWarning.headline: No internet connection
offlineWarning.help: You don't seem to have an internet connection. Some features of this wizard need a connection. You could either connect your router to the internet or use the online version of this wizard with another connection, save the config file there and then apply it to your router

authentication.headline: Authentication
authentication.description: To read data from the router and save the configuration you need to enter a URL and your root password.

loadconfig.headline: Load configuration
loadconfig.help: If you already have a config file, you can load it. So you're able to update it or adapt it for other routers you want to set up.

upload.drop: Drag your file here or click.
upload.dropnotsupported: Your browser doesn't support drag and drop for file uploads :(

routerName.label: Router name
routerName.help: The router name is shown in the Mesh network and used by various services, in case you enable them (monitoring, Freifunk map, contact page).

password.label: New router password
password.error.minLength: A password must have at least 6 characters.

sshkeys.label: Enable SSH keys
sshkeys.help: Passwordless root login to your router. SSH keys are helpful, if you maintain multiple routers or if you want to give access to a friend.

keys.label: Your keys
keys.help: Add your keys, each in a new line.
keys.invalidkey: One of your keys is invalid.

email.label: Your email address
email.help: Your email address is required if VPN cert/key generation or IP registration is activated below.

error.required: A valid email address is required for the current configuration.
error.pattern: Please enter a valid email address.

options.label: Is it okay to be contacted by other Freifunkas?

contactPage.label: Show on Contact Page
contactPage.help: If people connect to the Freifunk network, they can then see the contact data on frei.funk (only visible within freifunk).

sendToMap.label: Send on Freifunk map
sendToMap.help: Enable if you want your email address to be sent to the map (visible on http://openwifimap.net).

mailinglist.label: Mailing list
mailinglist.help: We communitcate via the mailing list of Berlin's freifunk community.
mailinglist.helpoffline: Please visit the mailing list page of Berlin's freifunk community, when you're online again. There you can subscribe to that list.

routerLocation.headline: Router location
routerLocation.help: The geographic location is used to place your router on the Freifunk map.
routerLocation.offlineMsg: Your internet connections seems offline. Using the map only works when you're online. You can add your location manually or do that later.

internetSharing.headline: Internet sharing
internetSharing.help: Freifunk can be used for local services and grants access to the internet. This is possible because people within the network decide to share their internet connections.

shareInternet.label: Share internet
shareInternet.help: Yes, I'd like to share my internet connection within the Freifunk network.
shareInternet.thanks: Thank you for sharing your internet connection!

limitspeed.label: Limit speed
limitspeed.help: If you encounter speed problems, you can limit the data transfer rate of your shared connection. Our advice: start without any limits, you can adjust that later.

transferSpeed.label: Transfer limit
transferSpeed.help: You can determine your current transfer speed here. Leave the fields blank if you do not wish to limit the transfer speed.

internettunnel.label: VPN
internettunnel.help: Tunnels your internet traffic to a different server.

meshvpn.label: Mesh VPN
meshvpn.help: Connects mesh clouds via internet tunnel. (Use, if your router is not connected to the backbone via radio.)

generateCertificate.label: VPN certificate and key for this router
generateCertificate.help: The Förderverein Freie Netzwerke operates the VPN03 servers for protecting yourself from the Störerhaftung. If this option is enabled, the wizard automatically generates a new certificate and key for VPN03. Disable this option if you already have a VPN03 config or if you want to use another VPN service (OpenVPN).

error.pattern: Wrong file format or name. Only text files are allowed.
Wrong file format or name. Only text files are allowed.
Wrong file format or name. Only text files are allowed.

conf.label: VPN configuration file
conf.customvpn: I want to use another VPN service. Then you need an opnVPN config file from your VPN provider.

error.pattern: Wrong file format or name. Only text files are allowed.

generateCertificate.error.required: The file is required. It is generated automatically if you select the checkbox above.

vpninfo.list:
• Evernet eG is providing VPN for Freifunkas
  • IPredator provides you with an encrypted tunnel from your computer to the Internet.
  • Freifunk Rheinland acts as Community Provider
  • Förderverein Freie Netzwerke operates non encrypted VPN03 servers.
  • Or choose an OpenVPN for example from this comparision: http://www.vpnvergleich.net/

ip.headline: IP addresses
ip.help: Your router requires IP addresses for communicating with other routers and with clients that connect to the access point. Freifunk uses both IPv4 (legacy) and IPv6 (recent).

register.label: Register new IP addresses
register.help: This wizard automatically registers new IP addresses in the Freifunk Berlin IP registry. Disable only if you already have IP addresses.

v6Prefix.label: IPv6 prefix
v6Prefix.help: The IPv6 prefix is used to automatically configure all network interfaces of this router.
v6Prefix.error.ipAddress: Please enter a valid IPv6 prefix.
v6Prefix.error.ipPrefixMaxLength: The IPv6 prefix length must not be larger than /62.

v4.error.ipSingle: You must provide a single IPv4 address.
v4.error.ipSubnetSmall: The IPv4 subnet must be larger than /30.

wifi.label: Mesh IP {{index}}
wifi.help: A single IPv4 address for the wifi device {{name}}.

lan.label: Mesh IP LAN
lan.help: A single IPv4 address for the LAN interface.

meshLan.help: Allows you to connect the LAN ports of your router via a cable to other devices that also have this setting enabled. If you only have one router, this setting can be turned off.
meshLan.label: Mesh via LAN

subnet.label: Client IPv4 subnet
subnet.error.pattern: This is not a valid subnet.
subnet.help: The IPv4 subnet from which IPs are distributed to clients that connect to your access point.

expectedClients.label: Expected number of concurrent clients
expectedClients.help: Please estimate how many devices will be connected to your access point at the same time.

error.required: This field is required unless you register new IPs automatically.
error.ipPattern: This is not a valid IP adress.

monitoring.headline: Monitoring
monitoring.show: Public monitoring - Enable it, so that Freifunkas are able to analyze network problems.
monitoring.label: Enable Monitoring
monitoring.help: Berlin community monitoring service is available to the public under http://monitor.berlin.freifunk.net. It collects information about transfer speeds, memory and CPU statistics and network connections.

advancedWifi.headline: Advanced wifi options
advancedWifi.help: By default your router is configured to connect automatically with other Freifunk routers that have default settings. If you want to connect to a router with a special configuration, you should use the following options.
advancedWifi.description: Pick the router from the list provided via the automated wifi scan or enter the configuration manually.
advancedWifi.channel.label: Channel

filter.label: Filter SSID by
filter.noresult: No scan results match the filter {{filter}}!

configIncorrect: The data you entered is invalid. Please correct the fields marked with before you continue.
applysuccesful: Your config was applied succesfully! Yeah!
applyerror: Your config could not be applied. See logs on your router for details.

statusSystem.headline: System status
statusSystem.help: Some basic information on your router
statusSystem.noData: Could not load all your system data. Please check if you're connected to your router

statusOlsr.headline: OLSR status information
statusOlsr.help: This page shows OLSR neighbors, routes and interfaces

neighbors.title: Neighbors
neighbors.noData: Currently there is no data from OLSR.

links.title: Links
links.noData: Currently there is no data from OLSR.
